altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

---

Jeongsu Park, seorang pahlawan yang menyelamatkan dunia lain dengan tekad untuk balas dendam pada Kim Minsu Kisah tragis tentang seorang pahlawan yang membunuh para pahlawan, Sebuah kenyataan yang dingin tanpa akhir yang bahagia.

description.ja:
その日、ひとりの勇者によって町が一つ消えた。 異世界を救って現世に帰還した「剣の勇者」。だか彼を待っていたのは、家族の死と自分に向けられた嫌悪、そしてふりかかる不幸。 「こんな世界・・・ぶっ壊してやる」悲しみと狂気に満ちた勇者による破壊が始まる。

description.ko:
김민수에게 복수를 하겠다는 일념 하나로 이세계를 구한 용사, 박정수.
그는 스스로는 구했지만, 세계를 구하지 못했고, 자신의 세상을 멸망시킨 용사들을 죽이기로 마음 먹는다.

이 이야기는 해피 엔딩 따윈 없는 차가운 현실, 용사들을 죽이는 용사에 대한 이야기이다.

description.ne:
किम मिन-सू, एक हिरो, जसले घर फर्कने एकल सोचको साथ अर्को विश्व बचायो। उसले संसार बचायो, तर आफैंलाई बचाउन सकेन, र संसारलाई नष्ट गर्ने निर्णय गर्यो। यो कथा हिरोको अन्तिम क्षणहरुको बारेमा हो, एक चिसो वास्तविकता जसको कुनै राम्रो अन्त्य छैन

description.ru:
Пак Чон Су, герой, что спас мир только по одной причине - вернуться и отомстить Ким Мин Су.
Он спасся сам, но не смог спасти тех, кто были всем его миром. Пак Чон Су намерен уничтожить того, кто сотворил с ним это.

История без счастливого конца. Пробирающая до костей реальность, в которой герой убивает себе подобных.

พัคจองซู นักรบผู้กอบกู้อีกโลกหนึ่งได้ย้อนคืนกลับสู่โลกเดิมเพื่อแก้แค้น คิมมินซู นักรบผู้ฆ่าครอบครัวของเขา นี่คือเรื่องราวของนักรบที่ปราศจากตอนจบแสนสุข เพราะมันคือการห่ำหั่นนักรบด้วยกันเอง!

description.zh:
被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

---

為了報仇雪恨這唯一念頭而拯救異世界的勇士，雖然拯救了自己，卻拯救不了原本世界的他，決心要殺光毀滅世界的勇士們。 這是關於沒有幸福結局的冷酷現實，以及殺勇者們的勇者的故事。

title.en: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou wo Hajimaru

altTitles.ja: 処刑された賢者はリッチに転生して侵略戦争を始める

altTitles.ru: Казненный мудрец переродился в некроманта и начал тотальную войну

altTitles.ar: الساحر العائد للإنتقام من العالم~الساحر الذي تم إعدامه أعيد إحيائه كليتش وبدأ حرب ضد الجميع

ปราชญ์เกิดใหม่เป็นลิช

altTitles.ko: 처형당한 현자는 리치로 전생하여 침략 전쟁을 시작한다

altTitles.id: Sage Yang Dieksekusi Reinkarnasi Menjadi Lich Dan Memulai Perang Habis-Habisan

altTitles.en: The Executed Sage Who Was Reincarnated as a Lich Started an All-Out War

altTitles.pt-br: O Sábio que foi Executado, Reencarnou como o Lorde Demônio e Declarou Guerra com o Mundo

description.en: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
description.ja:
かつて勇者と共に世界を闇に沈めた魔王を討伐した英雄、賢者ドワイト。
しかし、その力から次代の魔王になるつもりだと無実の罪を着せられ、
死者の谷へ落とされ命を落とす…。
しかし、肉が腐り落ちるも、この世への執念からスケルトンとして
生き永らえていたドワイトは、この間違った世界を否定する事を誓い、
かつての魔王をも凌駕する力で無数のアンデッドを率い、侵略戦争を開始する…！

---
- [Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0651fj)
description.pt-br:
O Sábio Dwight, ele junto com o Herói derrotou o Lorde Demônio que afundou o mundo na escuridão. No entanto, eles foram falsamente acusados ​​de se tornarem os próximos Lordes Demônios por causa de seu poder, e foram jogados no Vale dos Mortos para morrer…

Mas embora sua carne tenha apodrecido, 
ele vive como um esqueleto por causa de seu rancor contra o mundo. Dwight jurou negar esse mundo errado, e com um poder que supera até mesmo o Rei Demônio do passado, e também liderando incontáveis ​​esqueletos. ele vai começar uma guerra total...!

altTitles.ru: Военный раб, ставший мастером боевых искусств

description.en:
The Murim Warring States period is where only the strong survives. This is the war slave Cheong Gwang and Myeong-Wol’s Murim Survival Story.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ko:
강자만이 살아남는 무림전국시대.
전쟁노예 천광과 중원제일의 기생 명월의
무림 생존기를 그린 가족 무협 액션 드라마.

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)
description.ru:
Главный герой - Чон Гван, будучи ребенком, попадает в военное рабство. Больше десяти лет он не видел своего отца и сестренку. Согласно уговору с преемником одной из сильнейших гильдий, он должен принести голову двадцати мастеров боевых искусств, и только тогда ему даруют свободу. Чон Гван жил мыслью о скором возвращении домой, однако... его обманули. Тогда он решает сбежать...

---

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59153035)

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

description.en:
The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

title.ja: Boku wa Isekai de Fuyo Mahou to Shoukan Mahou wo Tenbin ni Kakeru

altTitles.ja: ぼくは異世界で付与魔法と召喚魔法を天秤にかける

altTitles.en: Another World Survival: Min-maxing my Support and Summoning Magic

altTitles.id: Menyeimbangkan Sihir Pendukungku dan Sihir Pemanggilan Di Dunia lain

altTitles.en: Balancing My Support Magic and Summoning Magic In A Different World

description.en:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

(Hanashi Media)

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)
description.id: suatu hari. di sekolah swasta tertentu dengan asrama, seluruh sekolah dipindahkan ke dunia lain. aku, Kaya Kazuhisa. dari kelas 1 SMA. telah diintimidasi untuk waktu yang lama. untuk membunuh pelakunya yang telah menggangguku, aku menggali jebakan. tapi tiba-tiba aku membunuh monster. sejak saat itu. aku telah berevolusi menjadi keberadaan langka yang dapat melawan monster. di hari yang sama, aku menyelamatkan seorang gadis dari kelas 3 sekolah menengah, Shimozono Arisu di hutan dari orc. ketika aku bekerja dengan arisu untuk mengalahkan orc, dan secara bertahap naik aku level. aku dipaksa untuk membuat pilihan. haruskah aku memilih sihir pemanggilan yang cocok untuk bertahan hidup sendirian? atau aku harus pilih sihir pendukung yang digunakan saat bertarung bersama dengannya?
description.ja:
高等部1年生でいじめられっ子の賀谷和久（かや・かずひさ）は森の中、いじめの主犯格を殺すための落とし穴を掘っていた。だが数分後、その穴に落とし殺害することができたのは──!?　RPGのような異世界の山中へとまるごと転移した全寮制の学園のなか、スキルという名の“ちから”を得た和久。彼は自分ひとり生き抜くために最適な【召喚魔法】か、それとも少女たちを戦わせるための【付与魔法】か……天秤にかける。

獰猛なモンスターたちによる凌辱の危機が迫るなか、主人公と少女たちは果たして生き残れるのか……!?

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

description.en:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

altTitles.ja: ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  
After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom...   
Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. all visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes...  
A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
description.ja: 『異世界居酒屋「のぶ」』の作者・蝉川夏哉による原作書き下ろしのスピンオフ作品。次なる世界は異世界・東王国、王都パリシィア!王都パリシィアでも、異世界の住人たちは、初めて見る日本の居酒屋料理に戸惑いながらも舌鼓を打ち……。

description.en: “R“ or rather Room 402 is the room where our illustrious female main character lives. One day which seems to be by mere coincidence her fate intertwines with that of Sasamoto, a savvy man who seems to be down in the dumps. That is until he picks up a trinket which fell from her nether regions. Prepare yourself for a story of sexual psychological horror as Sasamoto enters into a brave new world.

title.en: Ore to Hero to Mahou Shoujo

altTitles.en: I, the Hero, and the Magical Girl

altTitles.ja: 俺とヒーローと魔法少女

description.en: Hayato, who obtained the power of the admired “Hero”. However, his transformed appearance was mysteriously that of a “magical girl” in a sparkly outfit. Unintentionally making even the hearts of enemy kaijin throb, this hero bursting onto the scene may make you, who is tired from study or work, even more tired. ★

K-League Third Division

The protagonist, Ma Jung-woo, is a strategic analyst.

As he suffered from mounting debt, he inherited his late grandfather's British football team without notice.
He tried to sell the club and start a new life...

What? 150 billion won in debt alone?

Jungwoo is trying to pay off his debts alone as the club owner's coach….

Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
description.id: Hanya musik yang menopangku dari rasa sakit yang menjengkelkan. Andai saja aku bisa mendengarkan musikku… dengan telingaku sendiri… Bahkan ketika jiwaku sedang hancur sekalipun, aku tetap akan berdoa kepada Tuhan… dan berdoa lagi. Ludwig van Beethoven dianggap sebagai komposer terhebat dalam sejarah manusia. Aku menutup mataku seperti itu. Dan 180 tahun kemudian di Seoul. Sang Saint musik, yang dikenal sebagai seorang jenius abadi, telah terlahir kembali. Dan kemudian tiba-tiba aku mulai mendengar suara malaikat. “Dobin.. Dobin..” …

description.en:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

altTitles.ja: 百木田家の古書暮らし

altTitles.en: Living in an Antiquarian Bookstore of the Karakida Family

description.en:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbōchō. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)
description.es: Kanda Jinbouchou, el barrio de librerías de segunda mano más famoso del mundo. Las tres hermanas Karakida se trasladaron a la ciudad para cuidar la herencia de su abuelo. Rodeadas del aroma de los libros usados, las tres hermanas hilvanan su día a día.
description.ja: 世界一の古書店街・神田神保町。祖父の遺した古本屋を引き継ぐため、その街で暮らすことになった百木田（からきだ）三姉妹。古本の香りに包まれながら三姉妹は色褪せない日常を紡いでいく――。

description.en: "If you think of me as a man, I'll gladly become a man ! " Lee Cho Hee, is an unlucky female idol trainee who always fail to debut because of her boyish appearance ! Thinking it was her last chance, she applied for the idol audition survival show "High Teen Universe"... but there was a problem with her gender. . .

altTitles.en: Embodiment of the Assassin in the Murim World

description.en:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.
description.ko:
No.1 킬러 김건은 의문의 사고로 무림 세계에 빠지게 되고
원래 있던 지구로 돌아가기 위해서는 '무림 제패'라는 임무를 완수해야 한다는 것을 알게 된다.

총 2자루와 함께 낯선 무림이란 세계를 평정하기 위한 김건의 모험이 시작된다.

description.en:
"Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"

Baek Kang-hyuk, South Korea’s top genius surgeon, finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times… right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!

Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

altTitles.en: Bowblade Swordsman: Descendants of the Bowblade
Archer Sword God: Descendants of the Archer

description.en: Eulji So Moon has aged well and is now a grandfather. He orders his mischievous grandson to go on a joyful trip to Zhongyuan! To save the fallen Namgung family clan and help them spread their wings once more, Eulji Ho’s journey starts now!!

title.en: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.ja: 異世界でスキルを解体したらチートな嫁が増殖しました 概念交差のストラクチャー

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Skill o Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita Gainen Kousa no Structure

altTitles.en: Being Able to Edit Skills in Another World I Gained OP Waifus

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 스킬을 해체했더니 치트인 신부가 증가했습니다

altTitles.zh: 在异世界解体技能后开挂新娘增加了

altTitles.zh-hk: 在異世界解體技能後開掛新娘增加了
以我的能力創造開外掛的老婆們

altTitles.fr: En pouvant éditer les skills dans un autre monde, j'ai gagné une femme surpuissante

altTitles.ru: Мои невесты из другого мира стали сверхсильными: скрещивание скиллов

description.en:
***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***  
  
When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚されたきっかけで特殊なスキルを手に入れた主人公・ナギ。今ではこのおかげで、ハーレムな毎日を過ごしています!?
description.pt:
Quando um ônibus cheio de pessoas é invocado para outros mundo, Nagi Souma não segue a ideia de ser um herói como os outros. E assim ele deixa o palácio e começa sua vida num outro mundo com sua habilidade de reestruturar habilidades.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/sengetsu_sakaki)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/katase_minami)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Manga Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/538264)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/cheat_yome/)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/cheatyome/)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6475dd)

description.en:
The beasthuman Noa has a dream of becoming a blacksmith, as Noa's father, Nomad, used to be the acclaimed Divine Blacksmith.

Since Noa's mother died, Nomad has drowned his days in liquor and grief, so Noa ventures to dangerous places to get Nomad's smithing materials. This leads to Noa's life being in continual risk.

Noa is now 14 and doing normal work as a smithy to support Nomad, when Nomad makes an unreal discovery about his child! All of the materials Noa's collected are unbelievably rare! Nomad calls his familiar adventurer to check Noa's level...and it's at an amazingly high 596!

What's the secret to this super-high level, higher than even the kingdom's hero?! Check out this adventuring fantasy that unfolds around a puppy-human apprentice that's out of this world!

Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

title.en: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People. ~To the Savior~

altTitles.ja: 悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。～To the Savior～

altTitles.ja-ro: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.: To the Savior

description.en:
At the age of eight, I realised I had reincarnated as the nefarious last boss of an otome game, Queen Pride. Her fighting strength is high because she’s the last boss who will fight with the capture target, and her superior cunning wits make her the most powerful first princess in a matriarchal country. Since she brings misfortune to all that surrounds her, what awaits is a future of ruination! …really, wouldn’t it be better if I died?

In this case, I’ll avoid destruction from the capture target and freely use my authority and cheat abilities to save everyone!

---

**Note: This manga is continuation of the canceled manga, be sure to read that one first (check the related tab)**

Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

description.en: Strange bunny girls have been appearing all over the city, attempting to recruit people into a mysterious cult known as "The Warren Divine".
In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

Steve is a builder that just wants to mine materials and craft in peace, but the mysterious monster girls that surround him wont leave him in peace!

---

**Note:** This is the webtoon version of [Minecraft - Anime Edition](https://mangadex.org/title/ad547db3-2e92-4f9b-b386-70c9f88fc0c1)
A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.
description.ro: Un vrajitor homosexual si o preoteasa seductiva se intalnesc din intamplare intr-un online RPG
description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

description.en: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi

altTitles.en: Office Worker Has Become "Big Four" in the Different World.

altTitles.ja: サラリーマンが異世界に行ったら四天王になった話

altTitles.en: Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

altTitles.tr: Başka Bir Dünyaya Yöneldi: Maaşlı Adamdan Göksel Krala!

description.en: Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman who one day is run over, and left in the street to die, however, when he regains consciousness, it seems as though he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

altTitles.vi: Nhất quỷ nhì ma, thứ ba Takagi

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の高木さん

altTitles.es: La Maestra de las Bromas: Takagi - San

altTitles.th: แกล้งนัก รักนะ รู้ยัง?

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong si Takagi-san

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
description.id: Komik ini bercerita tentang seorang siswa Sekolah Menengah Nishikata dan Takagi duduk bersebelahan di kelas. Takagi menikmati menggoda Nishikata dengan lelucon dan lelucon yang memalukan. Sebagai tanggapan, Nishikata membuat rencana untuk membalas dendam, tetapi dia gagal ketika dia mengidentifikasi kelemahannya dan memanfaatkannya. Dalam beberapa kasus langka di mana Takagi kehilangan tantangan, Nishikata tidak merasa seperti dia benar-benar menang. Pengaturan ini didasarkan pada kota Tonoshou di Prefektur Kagawa.
description.zh:
“脸红，你就输了！”
	
「今天一定要捉弄高木同学，让她害羞！」
某所中学，在各种方面都被邻座的女生高木同学捉弄的男生西片。
他为了对此反击而每天奋斗，但……？
这样的高木同学与西片带来的
全力「捉弄」青春大战开始了！
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

title.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis House

altTitles.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis

description.en:
"To stay alive… I have no choice but to become a genius. From today, I’ll do my best, so please support me." 
Lee Hyun-woo finds himself possessing Kyle Seltarion, an extra character from a game where he used to reign as the world’s number one player.  
Considering the game’s storyline, he soon faces the imminent death of Kyle, who, on top of being on death's door, can't use magic or aura and has a terrible reputation. How did he end up in the body of such a character?  
However, after discovering a new talent, he learns to harness mana and begins to shift his attributes and reputation with knowledge of hidden routes gained through grinding in the game.  
His immediate goal is to save his own life, but that goal is closely linked to the impending global catastrophe...  
To overcome this situation, he needs to gather allies and boost his reputation! It's time to turn his past, which was a reckless mess, around and move into a new phase!

title.en: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes

altTitles.zh: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.
An 8-page "quarter" oneshot. A high school student finds it easier to relate to his best friend than his girlfriend.

Nagumo Yumi is an airhead high school girl, whose post-graduation plan is to go to the US and become president. 
To her high school friends' amazement, she actually manages to make it to the US during summer vacation. 
After befriending some elderly veterans, she becomes convinced that joining the Marine Corps is the best way 
to move her dream forward. The waitress Linda Crawford joins her to sign up at the recruitment center, 
and she also makes friends among the new recruits, Rita Fernandez and Donna King. 
Will they have what it takes to become a Marine?

title.en: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Boku-tachi wa Mada Shiranai.

altTitles.tl: Hindi pa rin Namin Alam ang Pangalan ng Bulaklak na Nakita Namin noong Araw na Iyon

altTitles.id: Kita masih belum tahu nama bunga yang kita lihat hari itu

altTitles.ja: あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我們仍未知道那天所看見的花名

altTitles.ko: 그날 본 꽃의 이름을 우리들은 아직 모른다.

altTitles.ne: त्यो दिन हामीले देखेको फूलको नाम हामीलाई अझै थाहा छैन।

altTitles.en: We Still Don't Know the Name of the Flower We Saw That Day.

description.en:
Jinta Yadomi and his group of childhood friends have become estranged after a tragic accident split them apart. Now in their high school years, a sudden surprise forces each of them to confront their guilt over what happened that day and come to terms with the ghosts of their past.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2019)
description.es-la: Un grupo de amigos de la infancia se separa a causa de la muerte de una amiga del grupo, Menma. Ahora Jintan, un integrante del grupo, puede ver el espiritu de Menma que quiere cumplir un deseo, pero para eso, Jintan deberá reunir a sus antiguos amigos de la infancia, el problema es que ellos han cambiado mucho. Jintan tiene que ayudar a Menma a cumplir su deseo y así poder ir al "cielo".
description.pt-br: Um grupo de seis amigos de infância se separam após um deles, Honma "Menma" Meiko, morrer em um acidente. Dez anos seguintes desta tragédia, o líder do grupo, Yadomi Jinta, isola-se da sociedade e vive recluso. Em um dia de verão, porém, Menma aparece para Jinta, com uma aparência mais velha, pedindo-lhe ajuda para realizar seu desejo. Ela acredita que precisa realizá-lo para cumprir seu destino. Só que Menma não lembra qual era seu desejo, fazendo com que Jinta reúna seus amigos de infância outra vez, pois acredita que eles sejam a chave para resolver esse problema. No entanto, os sentimentos escondidos, os conflitos internos e a persistência dos sentimentos de tristeza pelos pais de Menma, resultam em complicações para o grupo, enquanto eles lutam não só para ajudarem Menma, mas a si mesmos.

title.en: The Story of Medusa Falling From The Ceiling.

altTitles.ja: 天井からメデューサが降ってくる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenjou kara Meduusa ga Futtekuru Hanashi
Tenjou kara Medusa ga Futtekuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!
